course.title: PSY 6105 Factor Analysis in Psychological Research (3 units)
course.desc: Focus on the underlying rationale, conceptual understanding, basic design requirements, mathematical/inferential procedures, and range of applications related to both exploratory and confirmatory factor analyses. Students are introduced to both the LISREL and EQS statistical packages and each factor analytic example studied is accompanied by required computer application work.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: PSY 5121
